attributes.action: Real Nutrition in our NHS Hospitals.
attributes.additional_details:
Healthy snacks and refreshments, with fruit and vegetable juice to provide naturally balanced nutrition to “turbo-charge” healing. 

Establish a national standard for micro-nutritious Hospital meals with a larger serving of vegetables; meals to nourish and inspire its patients and their families.

Invest in the nutritional infrastructure of the Nation by sourcing fresh produce from small farms under a fair price structure that pays more than super markets.

www.facebook.com/NHSnutrition
attributes.background: Medical intervention helps, but your body heals you! Wound healing and the immune system are impaired in a body deficient in micro-nutrients. We ask for a commitment to put nutritional health at the heart of our NHS and for a phased introduction of fresh food and juices into our Hospitals by 2020.
